summary: Diff adds centralized route constants, updates router paths to include /lore -> BlogLore, adds explicit Admin link in header, updates Admin access submission flow to immediately navigate to /admin on “Access Granted”, and introduces an Admin access gate plus improved Admin dashboard shell/sidebar/topbar. However, several requested acceptance criteria cannot be confirmed from the truncated diff summary (notably specific AdminAccess UI text, backend “Access Granted” exact return behavior, and completion of the QA checklist/site-wide audit).

missing_requirements.requirement: Perform a full-site audit and fix all runtime errors, broken navigation/links, layout overlaps, styling conflicts, and script/JS conflicts across every page and component.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows multiple targeted changes (routing constants, header/footer links, admin flow, admin dashboard components), but does not provide evidence that *every* route/component has been audited and fixed, nor that there are no remaining console errors/overlaps across the whole site.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (high-level summaries only, not verification of all routes)
